H0.text: An increase in the length of a day is the change on Earth most likely contributed by human activity.

H1.text: A decrease in the number of volcanic eruptions is the change on Earth most likely contributed to by human activity.

H2.text: A decrease in the magnitude of large earthquakes is the change on Earth most likely contributed to by human activity.

H3.text: An increase in the amount of atmospheric carbon dioxide is the change on Earth most likely contributed to by human activity.

A4.text: The current increase in CO2 concentrations is primarily driven by the burning of fossil fuels.
